page.title: 06UXBRIDGE GOLF COURSE
page.content: The Uxbridge Golf Course was founded in 1946 by the Hillingdon Borough Council.The site is around 125 acres of land and is surrounded by agricultural land and woodland.The clubs average income of people per day is 130 and 180 people at weekends.In the summer the club stages special classes for young budding golfers.Special season tickets are available to pensioners who are residents of the Hillingdon Borough.The golf course is easy to get to as it has two bus routes running nearby.These are within a 7 iron of the course.There are two roads joining up to it.These are The Avenue and Highfield Drive.The golf course has a small shop with equipment and golf accessories.Next door there is a restaurant which serves every day except Sunday.There is also a bar and
